name: Rocket’s Zapdos ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Darkness Guard
poke_body.effect: As long as Rocket’s Zapdos ex has any {D} Energy attached to it, damage done to Rocket’s Zapdos ex by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a {L} Energy card and attach it to Rocket’s Zapdos ex.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
